networkInfo.headline: Information on the organization type “Network”
networkInfo.sublineOne: Are you a coordinator or team member of a STEM cluster, a STEM region or another network?
networkInfo.sublineTwo: Read the following steps to create your organization as a <0>network organization</0>.

steps.headline: Set up your network correctly in 3 steps:

checkExisting.headline: Check whether your network organization has already been created and add yourself as a team member if necessary.
checkExisting.description: To do this, go to <0>“Add me to an organization”</0>. Here you can search for your organization or network on the platform <0>and add yourself.</0> If your network organization has not yet been created, you can do this in the following step.

createNetwork.headline: Create your network as an organization.
createNetwork.descriptionOne: Create your network using the <0>“Create organization”</0> button. In the next step, you can select the <0>organization type “Network”</0> and other applicable organization types.
createNetwork.descriptionTwo: Your network is now set up so that other organizations can request to join you or you can invite other organizations as network members.

addInformation.headline: Now you can further fill your network organization with information.
addInformation.description: Click on the <0>“Edit”</0> button and fill in the form with relevant information so that the community is well informed about your network.

invites.headline: Invites
invites.subline: An admin will be notified as soon as you respond to the invitation.

addOrganization.headline: Add me to an organization
addOrganization.subline: Search for organizations, add yourself as a team member or create an organization.

toasts.organizationsFound: Organizations with this name already exist. Ask if you can join an organization.

errors.alreadyInRelation: You have still requested to add this profile to this organization, have an invite or are already a member.
errors.custom: The data could not be saved. Please try again or contact the support team.

requests.headline: Join Requests
requests.createRequest: You have requested to join {{organization.name}}. You will be notified as soon as an admin responds to your request.
requests.cancelRequest: You have withdrawn your membership request to {{organization.name}}.
requests.rejectRequest: You have declined the membership request of {{academicTitle}} {{firstName}} {{lastName}}.
requests.acceptRequest: {{academicTitle}} {{firstName}} {{lastName}} has been added to your organization.

quit.success: You have successfully left the organization {{organization}}.
quit.lastAdmin: You cannot leave the organization because you are the last admin. Press edit to appoint another admin or delete the organization.

alerts.accepted: You have successfully joined the {{organization}} organization.
alerts.rejected: You have declined to join the {{organization}} organization.

createRequst.subject: Deine Organisation hat eine Mitgliedsanfrage erhalten.
